T04bsa047_u:323: ye cārupiṇaste 'pi tathaiva vicāryumāṇā niḥsvabhāvā eva /
T04bsa047_u:328: "bahirdhā nāsti vairūpaṃ svacittaṃ dṛśyate bahiḥ /" iti /
T04bsa047_u:329: tataśca nīlādicitrākāranirbhāsatayā grāhyagrāhakākāranirbhāsatayā naikasvabhāvā (Bhk 180) amī yuktāḥ /
T04bsa047_u:333: athavā tatrālīkā evāmī rūpādaya ākārāḥ pratibhāsanta ityubyupagamyate,
T04bsa047_u:336: na hi svayaṃ prakāśamānarūpatāvyatirekeṇānyad vijñānasya rūpamasti /
T04bsa047_u:338: teṣāṃ ca vijñānasvarūpāpannānām alīkatve sarvameva vijñānam alīkam abhyupetaṃ syāt /
T04bsa047_u:341: tasmād ekānekasvabhāvaśūnyatvena paramārthato 'līkā evāmī sarvabhāvā iti
T04bsa047_u:345: dṛśyate na ca tatrāsti tathā bhāveṣu bhavatā // iti /
T04bsa047_u:350: tadevaṃ cintāmayyā prajñayā niścitya bhūtamartha tasya pratyakṣīkaraṇāya bhāvanāmayīṃ prajñām utpādayet /
T04bsa047_u:352: anubhavaśca pratipattṛṇām, na cāpi sphuṭatarajñānālokodayam antareṇa samyagāvaraṇatamo 'pahīyate
T04bsa047_u:355: tathā ca bhāvanāyāḥ parisphuṭajñānaphalatvena sāphalyamuktam āryasamādhirāje-
T04bsa047_u:356: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahu ca vitarkayennaraḥ /
T04bsa047_u:357: tathā tathā bhavati tannimittacittastehi vitarkehi tanniśritehi // iti vistaraḥ /
T04bsa047_u:359: tatra prathamataraṃ tāvad yoginā śamatho niṣpādanīyaścittasthirīkaraṇāya /
T04bsa047_u:361: na cāsamāhitena cetasā yathābhutaṃ śakyate jñātum /
T04bsa047_u:364: śamatho lābhādikāmanānirapekṣasya samyakpravṛttau sthirasya duḥkhādyadhivāsanaśilasyārabdhavīryasya śīghrataraṃ sampadyate /
T04bsa047_u:365: ata eva āryasaṃdhinirvocanādau dānādaya uttarottaratvena varṇitāḥ /
T04bsa047_u:367: sarvabuddhabodhisattveṣu praṇāmādikaṃ kṛtvā pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ vidhāya sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇāśayo mahākaruṇām evābhimukhīkṛtya kāyam ṛjuṃ praṇidhāya sukhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya samādhimabhiniṣpādayet tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yad vastu vicārayitavyaṃ yāvatā prakāreṇa saṅkṣepataḥ sakalavastusaṅgraho bhavati tatra cittaṃ badhnīyat /
T04bsa047_u:369: etaccādikarmikasya vikṣepadoṣaparihārārtha saṃkṣiptaṃ tāvad yuktam ālambayitum /
T04bsa047_u:370: yadā tu jitamanaskāro bhavati tadā skandhadhātvādibhedena viśodhya vistaraśo 'pyālambata eva
T04bsa047_u:371: tathā sandhinirmocanādau yoginām aṣṭādaśaprakāraśūnyatālambanādibhedena nānāprakāram ālambanam uktam /
T04bsa047_u:372: atraiva bhagavatā sattvānugrahād rūpyarūpyādibhedena saṃkṣepamadhyavistāraiḥ vastubhedo 'bhidharmādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:374: tato niścitya sarvaṃ vastusaṅgrahaṃ tatraiva punaścittaṃ prabandhena prerayet /
T04bsa047_u:375: yada tvantarā rāgādinā cittaṃ bahirvikṣipet tadāvagamya vikṣepatām aśubhādibhāvanayā vikṣepam upaśāmya punastatraivoparyupari cittaṃ prerayet
T04bsa047_u:377: yadā tu cittaṃ tatrānabhirataṃ paśyet, tada samādherguṇadarśanato 'bhiratiṃ tatra bhāvayet
T04bsa047_u:379: atha yadā styānamiddhābhibhavād āalambanagrahaṇāprakaṭatayālīnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati tadā lokasaṃjñābhāvanayā prāmodyavastubuddhādiguṇamanasikārāt [vā] layaṃ upaśāmya punastadevālambanaṃ dṛḍhataraṃ gṛṇhīyāt atha yadā pūrvahasitaramitādyanusmarato 'ntarā cittam uddhataṃ paśyet,
T04bsa047_u:380: tadānityatādisaṃvegamanasikārād auddhatyaṃ praśamayet, tataḥ punastatraivālambane cittasyānabhisaṃskāravāhitāyaṃ yatnaṃ kurvīta /
T04bsa047_u:381: atha yadā layauddhatyabhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhicittaṃ paśyet tadābhogaśithīlīkaraṇād (Bhk 183) upekṣate /
T04bsa047_u:382: yadā tu samapravṛtte satyābhogaḥ kriyate, tadā cittaṃ vikṣipet /
T04bsa047_u:383: yadā tu tatrālambane 'nabhisaṃskāravāhi yāvadicchaṃ cittaṃ pravṛttaṃ
T04bsa047_u:388: ayaṃ ca śamathamārgo bhagavatā āryaprajñāpāramitādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:395: / upasthāpayati, vikṣepaṃ parihṛtya uparyupari punastatraivālambane sthāpayati /
T04bsa047_u:401: eṣa caiṣāṃ padānām arthaḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ maitreyeṇa ca vyākhyātaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:402: saṃkṣepeṇa sarvasaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:407: vyāyāmaḥ praśrabdhiḥ, smṛtiḥ, samprajanyam, cetanā, upekṣā ceti /
T04bsa047_u:419: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tvanābhogadoṣaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa ca cetanā bhāvanīyā /
T04bsa047_u:420: layauddhatyapraśame sati yadā cittaṃ praśamavāhi tadābhogadoṣaḥ, tatpratipakṣastadānīmupekṣā bhāvanīyā /
T04bsa047_u:421: ebhiraṣṭābhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ samanvāgataḥ samādhiḥ paramakarmaṇyo bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:425: eṣā ca cittaikāgratā uttarottarakarmaṇyatāsamprayogād ālambanādiguṇaviśeṣayogācca dhyānārūpisamāpattiḥ vimokṣādivyapadeśaṃ labhate /
T04bsa047_u:426: tathā hi yadopekṣāvedanāsamprayuktā savitarkasavicārā sā bhavati,
T04bsa047_u:429: pāpadharmaiśca] viviktā bhavati [vitarkavicāra]prītisukhādhyātmasamprasādaiḥ samprayuktā bhavati, tadā prathamaṃ dhyānam ucyate /
T04bsa047_u:431: yadā vitarkavicārarahitā prathamadhyānabhūmitṛṣṇayā viviktā ca bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:435: bhavati, sukhopekṣāsmṛtisamprajanyasamprayuktā bhavati, tadā tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam ucyate /
T04bsa047_u:437: aduḥkhāsukhā upekṣāsmṛtyabhisamprayuktā bhavati, tadā caturthaṃ dhyānamucyate /
T04bsa047_u:442: anyathā hi tīrthikānāmiva samādhimātreṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ na syāt /
T04bsa047_u:444: kiñcāpi bhāvayet samādhimetaṃ na co bibhāveyya sā ātmasaṃjñām /
T04bsa047_u:445: punaḥ prakupyati kileṣu tasya yathodrakasyeha samādhibhāvanā // iti /
T04bsa047_u:452: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāse na paśyati // iti /
T04bsa047_u:453: tatrāyamarthaḥ- prathamaṃ yogī ye rūpiṇo dharmā bāhyārthatayā paraiḥ parikalpitāsteṣu tāvad vicārayet /
T04bsa047_u:454: kimete vijñānād anye, āhosvid vijñānamevaitat tathā pratibhāsate, yathā svapnāvasthāyāmiti
T04bsa047_u:458: tasyāsamanupaśyata evaṃ bhavati cittamātramevaitat sarvaṃ na punarbāhyo 'rthā vipadyate /
T04bsa047_u:465: tatra yaccittamātraṃ tadapyasati grāhye grāhako na yukto grāhakasya grāhyapekṣatvad tataścittaṃ grāhyagrāhakaviviktam advayameva cittamiti vicārayed advayalakṣaṇe-
T04bsa047_u:469: evaṃ cittamātramatikramya tadapi dvayanirābhasaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadatikrameta /
T04bsa047_u:470: svataḥ parato bhāvānāṃ janmānupapatteḥ grāhyagrāhakayoścālīkatve tadavyatirekāt tasyāpi satyatvamayuktamiti vicārayet /
T04bsa047_u:471: tatrāpyadvayajñāne vastutvābhiniveśaṃ tyajet, advayajñānanirābhāsa eva jñāne tiṣṭhedityarthaḥ
T04bsa047_u:474: tathā cādvayajñānanirābhāse jñāne yadā sthito yogī tadā paramatattve sthitatvāt, mahāyānaṃ sa paśyati /
T04bsa047_u:475: etadeva tat mahāyānam ucyate yat paramatattvadarśanam /
T04bsa047_u:476: etadeva tat paramatattvadarśanaṃ yat sarvadharmān prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayataḥ samyagjñānāvaloke satyadarśanam /
T04bsa047_u:477: tathā coktaṃ sutre- "katamaṃ paramārthadarśanam? sarvadharmāṇām adarśanam /" iti /
T04bsa047_u:478: atredṛśamevādarśanamabhipretaṃ na tu nimīlitākṣajātyandhānāmiva pratyayavaikalyād amanasikārato vā yadadarśanam /
T04bsa047_u:480: tato bhāvābhiniveśadiviparyāsavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvād asaṃjñisamāpattyādivyutthitasyeva punarapi bhāvābhiniveśamūlasya rāgādikleśagaṇasyotpatteramukta eva yogī bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:484: tatrāpi prajñayā nirūpayato yo 'nupalambhaḥ sa tatrāmanasikāro 'bhipreto
T04bsa047_u:486: na hyasaṃjñisamāpattyādiriva anādikāliko rūpādyabhiniveśo manasikāraparivarjanamātrāt prahīyate
T04bsa047_u:487: saṃśayā prahāṇe tu na pūrvopalabdheṣu ca rūpādiṣvabhiniveśamanasikāraparivarjanaṃ śakyaṃ kartum agnyaparivarjane dāhāparivarjanavat /
T04bsa047_u:488: tathāmī rūpādimithyāvikalpāḥ kaṇṭakādivadutkīlya na hastena cetaso 'panetavyāḥ /
T04bsa047_u:490: tacca saṃśayabījaṃ yoginaḥ samādhyāloke sati prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatastesāṃ rūpādīnāṃ pūrvopalabdhānām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām anupalambhād, rajjoḥ
T04bsa047_u:492: tathā saṃśayabījāpagamād rūpādinimittamanasikāraḥ śakyate varjayituṃ nānyathā /
T04bsa047_u:493: anyathā hyasati samādhyāloke prajñācakṣuṣāpyanavaloke yathā andhakūpāvasthitapuruṣasyāvacarakagataghāṭādiṣviva yogino rūpādiṣvastitvasaṃśayo naiva nivarteta /
T04bsa047_u:494: tadanivṛttyā cā prahīṇatimiradoṣasyeva yo 'yukto 'līkarūpādyabhiniveśaḥ pravarteta na kenāpi nivartyeta /
T04bsa047_u:495: tasmāt samādhihastena manaḥ sandhāya sūkṣmataraprajñāśastreṇa tatra cetasi rūpādimithyāvikalpabījam uddharet /
T04bsa047_u:497: taravo bhūmernirmūlatayā mithyāvikalpāḥ punaścetasi na virohanti /
T04bsa047_u:498: ata evāvaraṇaprahāṇāya śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhavāhī mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ, tayoḥ avikalpasamyagjñāne hetutvāt /
T04bsa047_u:500: śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya samādhilābhāḥ samādhilābhācca hi prajñābhāvanā /
T04bsa047_u:501: prajñayā jñānaṃ bhavati viśuddhaṃ viśuddhajñānasya hi śīlasampat // iti /
T04bsa047_u:502: tathā hi yadā śamathenālambane cittaṃ sthirīkṛtaṃ bhavati tadā prajñayā vicārayataḥ samyagjñānāloka utpadyate, tadāndhakāramivāloke prakāśayati āvaraṇam apahīyate /
T04bsa047_u:506: sa ca samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti vacanādekāntena prajñānukūla eva bhavati,
T04bsa047_u:507: na tu viruddhastasmāt syāt samāhitasya prajñayā nirūpayataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanupalambhaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:509: sā ca tādṛśī yogināmavasthānalakṣaṇā gatiranābhogā, tataḥ paraṃ dṛṣṭavyasyābhāvāt /
T04bsa047_u:511: tathā hi yadā prajñayā nirūpayan na kiñcid bhāvasvabhāvam upalabhate yogī,
T04bsa047_u:514: yadi bhāvaḥ kadācid dṛṣṭo bhavati, evaṃ sati tanniṣedhenābhāvavikalpaḥ
T04bsa047_u:516: yadā tu kālatraye 'pi bhāvo yoginā prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatā
T04bsa047_u:517: nopalabdhaḥ, tadā kathaṃ tasya pratiṣedhenābhāvavikalpaṃ kurvīta /
T04bsa047_u:518: evamanye 'pi vikalpāstadā tasya na samutpadyanta eva bhāvābhāvavikalpābhyāṃ (Bhk 189) sarvavikalpasya vyāptatvāt /
T04bsa047_u:521: tatra sthitasya yoginaḥ sarvavikalpānām astaṃgamāt samyak kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate
T04bsa047_u:522: tathā hi kleśāvaraṇasyānutpannāniruddhabhāveṣu bhāvādiviparyāso mūlaṃ kāraṇam āryasatyadvayanirdeśādau varṇitaṃ bhagavatā
T04bsa047_u:523: anena ca yogābhyāsena sarvabhāvādivikalpānāṃ prahāṇāt sakalabhāvādiviparyāsasyāvidyāsvabhāvasya kleśāvaraṇamūlasya prahāṇam /
T04bsa047_u:525: tathā coktaṃ satyadvayanirdeśe- "kathaṃ mañjuśrīḥ, kleśā vinayaṃ gacchanti, kathaṃ kleśāḥ parijñātā bhavanti? mañjuśrīrāha- paramārthato
T04bsa047_u:536: yaśca yoniśaḥ prayuktaḥ tasyātmasamāropo na bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:537: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:538: yāvat paramārthato nirvāṇadṛṣṭisarva dṛṣṭiparyutthānam api na bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:539: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃ vinītā draṣṭavyāḥ /
T04bsa047_u:541: yadā, devaputra! kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato
T04bsa047_u:544: tatra (Bhk 190) yathāpi nāma, devaputra! ya āśīviṣasya gotraṃ prajānāti /
T04bsa047_u:547: devaputra! ya kleśānāṃ gotraṃ prajānāti tasya kleśāḥ praśāmyanti /
T04bsa047_u:548: devaputra āha- kataman mañjuśrīḥ! kleśānāṃ gotram /
T04bsa047_u:549: āha- yāvad eṣā paramārthato 'tyantājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kalpanā idaṃ
T04bsa047_u:552: tatprahāṇe sakalaviparyāsaprahāṇād jñeyāvaraṇam apyanena samyak prahīyate,
T04bsa047_u:554: jñeyāvaraṇe ca prahīṇe pratibandhābhāvād ravikiraṇavad apagatameghādyāvaraṇe nabhasi sarvatrāvyāhato yogi pratyakṣo jñānālokaḥ pravartate /
T04bsa047_u:556: tacca saṃnihitam api vastu pratibandhasadbhāvānna prakāśayati /
T04bsa047_u:557: pratibandhābhāve tu sati, acintyaśaktiviśeṣalābhāt kimiti sakalam eva vastu yathāvad na prakāśayet
T04bsa047_u:558: ataḥ saṃvṛtiparamārtharūpeṇa sakalasya vastuno yathāvat parijñānāt sarvajñatvam avāpyate /
T04bsa047_u:561: yastu śrāvakādīnāṃ mārgastena viparyāsāprahāṇān na samyag āvaraṇadvayaṃ prahīyate /
T04bsa047_u:562: tathā coktam āryalaṅkāvatāre- "anye tu kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvānirvāṇe 'pi nirvāṇam iti buddhayo bhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:568: ata eva cānyena mārgeṇa mokṣābhāvād ekam eva yānam uktaṃ bhagavatā /
T04bsa047_u:570: tathā hi sakandha mātramevaitat, na tvātmāstīti bhāvayan śrāvakaḥ pudgalanairātmyam avatarati, vijñaptimātraṃ traidhātukamiti bhāvayan
T04bsa047_u:575: uktaṃ ca āryalokottaraparivarte "punaraparaṃ bho jinaputra! cittamātraṃ traidhātukam avatarati, tacca cittam anantamadhyatayāvatarati" iti /
T04bsa047_u:578: sā ceyaṃ yoginām avasthā kuto viśodhitā? ityāha-
T04bsa047_u:580: mahākaruṇayā yat sarvasattvārthakaraṇāya bodhisattvena praṇihitam, tataḥ praṇidhānabalād uttarottaradānādikuśalābhyāsāt sā tathā viśuddhā jāta, yena sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatājñāne 'pi sakalasattvāpekṣā na vyāvartate yāvat saṃsāra eva ananuliptāḥ saṃsāradoṣairavatiṣṭhanta iti /
T04bsa047_u:584: yasmād yad advayalakṣaṇaṃ jñānam advayavādināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paramārthenābhimataṃ tadapi nirātmakaṃ niḥsvabhāvam advayanirābhāsena jñānena paśyati yogī /
T04bsa047_u:588: atredānīṃ ko 'sau yogī vidyate, yaḥ paśyatīti cet? na paramārthataḥ kaścid
T04bsa047_u:589: ātmādiḥ svatantro 'sti, yogī nāpi kaścit paśyati /
T04bsa047_u:590: kintu saṃvṛtyā yathā rūpādīviṣayākārajñānotpādamātreṇa vijñānameva loke tathā tathā vyavahriyate devadatto yajñadattaṃ jñānena paśyatīti na tu kaścid ātmādirasti /
T04bsa047_u:591: tathātrāpi jñānamevādvayajñānanirābhāsam utpadyamānaṃ tathā vyapadiśyate nirābhāsena jñānena paśyatiti /
T04bsa047_u:592: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi saṃvṛtyā yogijñānam anyad vā pṛthagjñānaṃ neṣṭam /
T04bsa047_u:596: kathaṃ bhavet, kintu yasya saṃvṛtyāpi kāraṇaṃ nāsti sa saṃvṛtyāpi notpadyate /
T04bsa047_u:598: yasya tu [kāraṇaṃ] vidyate sa paramārthato 'līko 'pi samutpadyata eva /
T04bsa047_u:601: na ca māyādeḥ saṃvṛtyā pratītyasamutpāde paramārthato
T04bsa047_u:604: / tatra yathā kleśakarmamāyāvaśāt sattvānāṃ janmamāyā pravarteta, tathā yogināmapi puṇyajñānasambhāramāyāvaśād yogijñānamāyā pravartata eva /
T04bsa047_u:610: ayaṃ tu viśeṣo yogināṃ pṛthagjanebhyaḥ, te hi māyākāravat tāṃ māyāṃ yathāvat parijñānāt satyato nābhiniviśante, (Bhk 193) tena te yogina ucyante /
T04bsa047_u:611: ye tāṃ bālapṛthagjanavat kautūhalaṃ styatvenābhiniviṣṭāste viparītābhiniveśad bāla ucyante iti sarvamaviruddham /
T04bsa047_u:614: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
T04bsa047_u:618: tatra ca layauddhatyādīn vyutthitān pūrvavat praśamayet /
T04bsa047_u:619: yadā tu sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālambane ca layauddhatyādirahitam anabhisaṃskāreṇa pravṛttaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati, tadā śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhavāhī mārgo
T04bsa047_u:621: tathā yāvat śaknoti tāvad adhimuktibalena adhimukticaryābhūmau sthito bhāvayet /
T04bsa047_u:622: tato yathecchaṃ paryaṅkamābhujya vyutthāya punarevaṃ cintayet /
T04bsa047_u:623: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ paramārthata eva niḥsvabhāvā apyete saṃvṛtyā sthitā eva /
T04bsa047_u:624: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe- "kathaṃ bodhisattvo nairātmyakuśalo bhavati?
T04bsa047_u:625: iha kulaputra, bodhisattvaḥ samyakprajñayā rūpaṃ pratyevakṣate, vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ pratyavekṣate /
T04bsa047_u:626: sa rūpaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpasyotpādaṃ nopalabhate, virodhaṃ nopalabhate, samudayaṃ nopalabhate
T04bsa047_u:627: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ nopalabhate,
T04bsa047_u:630: 'nutpādavihāriṇyāḥ prajñāyā na punarvyāvahārikeṇa svabhāvena" iti vistaraḥ /
T04bsa047_u:631: ete ca bālabuddhaya evaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu bhāveṣu (Bhk 194)
T04bsa047_u:632: viparītābhiniveśāt saṃsāre paribhramanto vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:633: mahākaruṇām eva āmukhīkṛtya evamanuvicintayet- tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā sarvajñatvaṃ prāpya eteṣāṃ dharmatāmavabodhayeyamiti /
T04bsa047_u:636: tathā coktam āryadharmasaṃgītau- "yathābhūtadarśino bodhisattvasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇā
T04bsa047_u:638: evaṃ cāsya bhavati- idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ
T04bsa047_u:640: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣātrayaṃ paripūryānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhim abhisambudhyate" iti /
T04bsa047_u:641: ayameva prajñopāyayuganaddhabāhī bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo yat paramārthadarśane 'pi saṃvṛtiṃ nocchedayanti
T04bsa047_u:642: saṃvṛtiṃ cānucchedayanto mahākaruṇāpūrvaṅgamā aviparyastā eva sattvārthakriyāsu pravartante
T04bsa047_u:645: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvāsu śikṣāsu śikṣate, śikṣāmārgaṃ ca nopalabhate /
T04bsa047_u:648: na ca taddhetukaṃ tannidānaṃ tatpratyayam ucchedadṛṣṭau patati" iti /
T04bsa047_u:649: āryadharmasaṃgītau coktam- "katamā bodhisattvānāṃ pratipattiḥ? yat kiñcid bodhisattvānāṃ kāyakarma, yat kiñcid vākkarma, yat kiñcin manaḥkarma, tat sarvasattvāpekṣakaṃ pravartate, mahākaruṇāpūrvaṅgamatvāt /
T04bsa047_u:652: sā mayā (Bhk 195) pratipattiḥ pratipattavyā sarvasattvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā /
T04bsa047_u:653: tasya skandheṣu māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca skandhaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
T04bsa047_u:654: dhātuṣvāśīviṣavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca dhātuparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
T04bsa047_u:656: rūpasya phenapiṇḍavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatarūpakāyaviṭhapanāṃ jahāti /
T04bsa047_u:657: vedanāyā budbudvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatadhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhaniṣpadanaprayogaṃ nārabhate /
T04bsa047_u:658: saṃjñāyāṃ marīcivat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatajñānaniṣpādana apratipattiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:659: saṃskārāṇāṃ kadalīvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca buddhadharmasaṃskārāṇām apratipattiḥ
T04bsa047_u:660: vijñānasya māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca jñānapūrvaṅgamakāyavāṅmanaskarmaniṣpādanā
T04bsa047_u:663: tatra yadi nāma lokottaraprajñāvasthāyām upāyasevanā na sambhavati,
T04bsa047_u:664: upāyasevanākāle tu bodhisattvasya māyākāravad aviparyastatvāt lokottarajñānāt prayogapṛṣṭhabhāvani yathāvad vastuparamārthatattvābhiniveśanī prajñāsambhavatyeveti, bhavatyeva prajñopāyayuganaddhavāhī mārgaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:666: evamanena krameṇa bodhisattvasya prajñām upāyaṃ ca satataṃ satkṛtya dīrghakālābhyāsena bhāvayato dvādaśāvasthāviśeṣā bhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:669: tatra yāvat pudgaladharmanairātmyatvaṃ na sākṣātkaroti, kevalaṃ dṛḍhatarādhimuktiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:673: asyāmapi bhūmau vartamāno bodhisattva pṛthagjano 'pi sarvabālavipattisamatikrānto
T04bsa047_u:675: asyā eva ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrādhimātratarāvasthācatuṣṭayena catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni vyavasthāpyante
T04bsa047_u:677: īṣatspaṣṭo jñānāloko bhavati tadā uṣmagatanāmakaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati
T04bsa047_u:679: yadā tu sa eva jñānaloko madhyamaspaṣṭo bhavati, tadā mūrdhanāmakanirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati,
T04bsa047_u:681: yadā tu spaṣṭataro bāhyārthānābhāsajñānāloko jāyate, tadā vijñaptimātrāvasthānāt kṣāntināmakaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:684: yadā tu grāhyagrāhakākārarahitam advayaṃ jñānaṃ vibhāvayet tadāgradharmākhyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:689: tathā hi yadāgradharmānantaraṃ prathamataraṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaprapañcarahitaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsākṣātkāri sphuṭataraṃ jñānam
T04bsa047_u:692: ata evāsyāṃ bhūmau prathamato 'nadhigatatattvādhigamād bodhisattvaḥ pramudito bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:694: atra ca dvādaśottaraṃ darśanaheyaṃ kleśaśataṃ prahīyate /
T04bsa047_u:698: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya dharmadhātusamudāgamatāprabodhāt svārtha iva parāthe pravartanād dānapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:700: vā yāvann śaknoti sūkṣmāpattiskhaliteṣu samprajanyavihāri bhavituṃ tāvat prathamā bhūmiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:701: yadā tu śaknoti, tadāsyāṅgasya paripūrito dvitīyā
T04bsa047_u:703: ata evāsyāṃ bhūmau sūkṣmāpattiskhalitasamudācārāt śīlapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:706: yāvanna śaknoti sakalalaukikaṃ samādhiṃ samāpattuṃ yathāśrutaṃ cārtham ādharttuṃ tāvad dvitīyaiva bhūmiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:709: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya śrutadhāraṇyā sarvalaukikasamādhyābhinirhārārthaṃ sarvaduḥkhasahanāt,
T04bsa047_u:711: teṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ lābhād iya bhūmirapramāṇaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānāvabhāsaṃ karotīti prabhākarītyucyate
T04bsa047_u:712: sa pratilabdhalaukikasakalasamādhirapi yāvann śaknoti yathāpratilabdhairbodhipakṣairdharmairbahulaṃ vihartuṃ sarvasamāpattīnāṃ ca cittam upekṣituṃ tāvat tṛtīyā bhūmiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:713: yadā tu śaknoti tadā tasyāṅgasya paripūritaścaturthī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
T04bsa047_u:714: asyāṃ bhūmau bodhisattvasyābhīkṣṇaṃ kāyavāṅmanojalpasamatikramaṇāaya bodhipakṣairdharmairviharaṇāt, viryaparamitātiriktatarābhavati /
T04bsa047_u:715: iyaṃ ca sakalakleśendhanadāhasamarthasya bodhipakṣadharmārciṣa udgatatvād arciṣmatītyucyate
T04bsa047_u:717: yāvanna śaknoti satyāni bhāvayan saṃsārānabhimukhaṃ nirvāṇābhimukhaṃ ca ceto vyāvartayitum upāyasaṃgṛhītān (Bhk 198) bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayitum, tāvaccaturthī bhūmiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:718: yadā tu śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūritaḥ pañcamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
T04bsa047_u:719: ata evāsyām iyam upāyasaṃgṛhītā bodhipakṣabhāvanā [paripūritena] suṣṭhu duḥkhena jīyate abhyasyatā iti sudurjayetyujyate /
T04bsa047_u:722: yāvad na śaknoti saṃsārapravṛttipratyavekṣaṇān nirvitsahayā cittasantatyānimittavihāraṃ samāpattuṃ tāvat pañcamī bhūmiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:723: yadā śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūritaḥ ṣaṣṭhī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
T04bsa047_u:724: asyāṃ ca bodhisattvasya pratītyasamutpādabhāvanāvihārāt prajñāpāramitātiriktatarā bhavati
T04bsa047_u:725: ata eva prajñāpāramitāyā atiriktataratvāt sarvabuddhadharmeṣu abhimukho 'syāṃ
T04bsa047_u:728: yāvanna śaknoti niśchidram animittavihāraṃ samāpattum, tāvat ṣaṣṭhī bhūmiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:729: yadā śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūritaḥ saptamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
T04bsa047_u:730: asyāmapi bhūmau bodhisattvaḥ sarvanimittaṃ nirnimittena pratividhyati nimittakṛtavyavahāraṃ ca na virodhayati /
T04bsa047_u:733: iyaṃ ca bhūmiranābhogamārgopaśleṣāt suṣṭhu dūraṅgamād dūraṅgamā /
T04bsa047_u:735: yāvanna śaknotyanābhogavāhinam animittavihāraṃ samāpattuṃ tāvat saptamī bhūmiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:737: asyāṃ ca bhūmau anābhogena kuśalapakṣayogāt praṇidhānapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:741: yāvanna śaknoti paryāyaniruktyādiprabhedaiḥ sarvākārasarvadharmadeśanāyāṃ vaśībhavituṃ tāvad aṣṭamī bhūmiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:742: yadā śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūrito navamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
T04bsa047_u:747: yāvanna śaknoti buddhakṣetraparṣannirmāṇādi darśayituṃ paripūrṇadharmasambhogaṃ sattvaparipākaṃ ca kartum, tāvad navamī bhūmiḥ /
T04bsa047_u:748: yadā tu śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūrito daśamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
T04bsa047_u:749: asyāṃ ca nirmāṇādinā sattvaparipācanāya jñānaviśeṣayogād bodhisattvasya jñānapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:750: iyaṃ ca dharmadeśanāmeghaiḥ ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmapravarṣaṇād dharmameghetyucyate /
T04bsa047_u:753: sa pratilabdha- nirmāṇādivaśito 'pi yāvan na śaknoti sarvasmin jñeye sarvākāram asaktam
T04bsa047_u:754: apratihataṃ jñānam utpādayituṃ tāvad daśamī bhūmi /
T04bsa047_u:757: asyāśca buddhabhūmeḥ sarvākārasakalasaṃpatprakarṣḍaparyantagamanānnāparam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthānāntaramasti [tasmāt tataḥ paraṃ nāsti bhūmivyavasthā] iti /
T04bsa047_u:758: asyāśca buddhamūmerguṇapakṣaprabhedo buddhairapi na śakyate sarvākāraṃ vaktum /
T04bsa047_u:766: [svaparārthasampattiprakarṣaparyantagataḥ, aśeṣadoṣāpagamaniṣṭhāṃ prāpya bhagavān buddho dharmakāye sthitvā sambhoganirmāṇakāyābhyām anābhogarūpeṇa
T04bsa047_u:768: tasmāt prekṣavadbhiḥ sarvaguṇākareṣu bhagavatsu śraddhā utpadanīyā,
T04bsa047_u:771: nayasyānusāreṇa sūtrasya cāṭha saduktyāsya mārgasya jinaputrakāṇām /
T04bsa047_u:772: mayānalpapuṇyaṃ yadāptaṃ ca tena parāmetu buddhiṃ jaganmandamāśu //
T04bsa047_u:773: bhūpatiśrīdevarājavacanena] kamalaśīlena bhāvanākramasya ayaṃ saṃkṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:781: itthamiyaṃ sarvajñatā tu hetuṃ vinā bhavituṃ na yujyate, sarvasyāpi sarvadā sarvajñatābhāvaprasaṅgatvāt
T04bsa047_u:782: nirapekṣabhāve tu kutrāpi pratigho na syād, yato hi sarve 'pi sarvajñā eva na bhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:783: kiṃ tarhi kasyacit kadācit kiñcinmātraṃmūtatvāt sarvaṃ hi vastu hetusāpekṣameva /
T04bsa047_u:785: sarvasminnapi kāle nāsti, sarvasmin sthāne nāsti, sarvamapi nāsti, tasmāt sā tu niyatameva hetupratyayasāpekṣā /
T04bsa047_u:792: ke hetupratyayāḥ sarvajñatāphalasya iti? ucyate, mādṛśo jātyandhasadṛśastān darśayituṃ na śaknoti, tathāpi bhagavataivābhisaṃbuddhaya vineyajanebhyo yathoktaṃ tathaiva mayā
T04bsa047_u:794: bhagavāṃstan avocat- "guhyādhipate! tat sarvajñajñānaṃ karuṇāmūlaṃ bodhicittahetukam upāyaparyavasānam" iti /
T04bsa047_u:795: tasmāt sarvajñatāmadhigantukāmaiḥ karuṇā-bodhicittopāyeṣu eteṣu triṣu śikṣitavyam /
T04bsa047_u:796: karuṇayā preryamāṇā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattvābhyuddhāraṇartham avaśyaṃ pratijñāsyanti /
T04bsa047_u:800: tatra praviśya paripūrṇa puṇyajñānasambhāram avaśyaṃ sādhayati /
T04bsa047_u:802: tarhi sarvajñatāmūlaṃ tu karuṇāyā eva bhūtatvāt sā tu prathamatarameva bhavanīyā /
T04bsa047_u:805: eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ supratibiddhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:812: sattvān avalokya tacchāntanirvāṇanagaraṃ prajvaladayogṛhavad dūraṃ tyaktatvād bhagavatām apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇahetustu sā mahākaruṇā eva /
T04bsa047_u:814: saṃprati upekṣābhāvanayā sarvasattveṣu anurāgaṃ dveṣaṃ ca nirasya samācittatā prathamaṃ niṣpādayitavyā
T04bsa047_u:815: sarve sattvāḥ sukhaṃ kāmayante, duḥkhaṃ tu na kāmayante /
T04bsa047_u:816: anādimati ca saṃsāre na kaścit sattvo yo nābhūt śataśo me bandhuriti paricintaya-
T04bsa047_u:817: taścātra ko viśeṣaḥ syāt? tarhi kasmiṃścid anurāgaḥ kasmiṃścicca dveṣo bhavet, tasmān mayā sarveṣu sattveṣu cittasamataiva kāryā iti /
T04bsa047_u:818: evaṃ manasikāreṇa madhyasthapakṣata ārabhya mitre śatrau cacittasamatāmeva bhāvayet /
T04bsa047_u:819: tataḥ sarvasattveṣu cittasamatāṃ sādhayitvā maitrīṃ bhāvayet /
T04bsa047_u:820: maitrījalena cittasaṃtānaṃ siṃcayitvā vidyamānasuvarṇabhūmivat kṛtvā karuṇābījavapane sukhena atisuvistāro bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa047_u:824: lokatrayasya sarvasattvānāṃ trividhaduḥkhatayā yathāyogam atyantaduḥkhitatvāt tadartha sarvasattveṣu sā bhāvanīyā /
T04bsa047_u:827: tathā pretā api prāyo duḥsahatīvrakṣuttṛṣuduḥkhāgnyabhisaṃśoṣitamūrtayo bahuduḥkhamanubhavanti iti varṇitāḥ /
T04bsa047_u:832: ye rāgādinānā-saṃkleśaparyaveṣṭitacittāḥ, ye ca vividhakudṛṣṭigahananimagnāste sarve 'pi duḥkhahetutvāt prapatasthā iva
T04bsa047_u:835: devā api ye kāmavacarāste 'pi nityacyavanapatanādibhayaśkopahatāḥ kathaṃ sukhitā nāma?
T04bsa047_u:836: saṃskāradu khaṃ tu karmakleśalakṣaṇaṃ hetuparatantrasvabhāvaṃ pratikṣaṇabhaṅgurasvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ ca sakalajagati vyāptam /
T04bsa047_u:837: tasmāt sakalameva jagad duḥkhāgnijvālāntarapraviṣṭam avetya yathā mama duḥkham apriyam anyeṣāmapi tādṛśam iti cintayatā /
T04bsa047_u:838: aho bata! duḥkhitā mamaite priyasattvāstu kathaṃ tadduḥkhamuktāḥ syuriti svātmaduḥkhavat
T04bsa047_u:839: tannivāraṇecchākārayā karuṇayā samādhyavasthāyāṃ sarvacaryāsu vāpi sarvadā sarvasattvān bhāvayet
T04bsa047_u:840: prathamaṃ tāvad mitrapakṣeṣu anubhūtapūrvoktavividhaduḥkheṣu anupaśyatā bhāvanīyā /
T04bsa047_u:841: tataḥ sattvasamatayāviśeṣamapaśyatā 'sarve sattvāstu me bandhubhūtā eva'
T04bsa047_u:843: yadā tatra mitrapakṣeṣviva sā karuṇā tulyā pravṛttā bhavati tadā daśasu dikṣu sarvasattveṣu
T04bsa047_u:844: / yadā duḥkhitapriyaśiśoḥ mātṛvat svātmano 'tipriyaṃ duḥkhata uddaraṇecchākārā svarasavāhinīṃ sarvasattveṣu samapravṛttā kṛpā bhavati tadā sā niṣpannā bhavati, mahākaruṇāvyapadeśaṃ ca labhate /
T04bsa047_u:846: prathamaṃ tāvad mitrapakṣe kṛtā maitrībhāvanā sukhasaṃyogecchākārā
T04bsa047_u:847: bhavati, kramaśaḥ vyasteṣu śatruṣu cāpi bhāvanīyā /
T04bsa047_u:848: tathābhyastā ca sā karuṇā kramaśaḥ sakalasattvābhyuddharaṇecchāṃ svarasena eva utpādayati
T04bsa047_u:852: tatra saṃvṛtaṃ tu karuṇayā sakalasattvābhyuddharaṇaṃ pratijñāya 'jagaddhitāya buddho bhaveyam'
T04bsa047_u:859: tatsiddhistu satataṃ satkṛtya dīrghakālaṃ śamathavipaśyanāyogabhāvanākaraṇād bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa047_u:860: āryasaṃdhinirmocane yathā "maitreya! śrāvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ vā ye 'pi sarve 'pi laukikalokottarakuśaladharmāḥ śamathavipaśyanāphalā veditavyā iti /" taddvayoḥ sarvasamādhisaṃgṛhītatvāt sarvayogibhiḥ sadā avaśyaṃ śamathavipaśyane sevanīye /
T04bsa047_u:861: tatraiva āryasaṃdhinirmocane bhagavatā uktam, tadyathā- "mayā śrāvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ vividhasamādhayo darśitāḥ, te sarve śamathavipaśyanāsaṃgṛhītā veditavyāḥ" iti /
T04bsa047_u:871: kiṃ cāpi bhāveyya samādhiloke na co vibhāveyya sa ātmasaṃjñām /
T04bsa047_u:872: punaḥ prakupyanti kileśu tasya yathodrakasyeha samādhibhāvanā /

T04bsa047_u:1120: atha śanaiḥ paryaṅkaṃ bhittvā daśadigvyavasthitān sarvabuddhobodhisattvān praṇipatya tebhyaśca pūjāstotropahāraṃ kṛtvāryabhadracaryādimahāpraṇidhānaṃ praṇidadhīta /
T04bsa047_u:1130: asati ca tathā buddhānām kṣetrādisaṃpattiryoktā sā kasya phalaṃ syāt /
T04bsa047_u:1131: tasmāt sarvākāravaropetaṃ tatsarvajñajñānaṃ tu dānādyupāyena paripūryamāṇatvād bhagavān tat sarvajñajñānam upāyena paryantagatam ityavocat /
T04bsa047_u:1132: tasmād bodhisattvena dānādyupāyo 'pi sevitavyo na tu śūnyatā eva /
T04bsa047_u:1134: ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bidhisattvānāṃ sambodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1135: vakṣyanti, prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ bodhisattvena śikṣitavyam, kiṃ śeṣābhiḥ pāramitābhiriti ucyante /
T04bsa047_u:1137: tat kiṃ manyase ajita! duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājo 'bhūd yena kapotārthena śyenāya
T04bsa047_u:1138: svamāṃsāni dattāni? maitreya āha, no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T04bsa047_u:1139: bhagavān āha- yāni mayā maitreya! bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitā-pratisaṃyuktāni
T04bsa047_u:1140: kuśalamūlānyupacitāni, apakṛtaṃ nu taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ? maitreya āha no
T04bsa047_u:1142: bhagavān āha- tvaṃ tāvad ajita! ṣaṣṭikalpāna dānāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ, ṣaṣṭikalpān śīlapāramitāyaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1143: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān viryapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭikalpān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1145: ekanayenaiva bodhiryaduta śūnyatānayeneti te caryāpariśuddhā bhavantītyādi /
T04bsa047_u:1146: upāyarahite sati bodhisattvaḥ prajñayā eva tu śrāvakavat buddhakāryāṇi kartuṃ na śaknoti /
T04bsa047_u:1150: kurvanti, evameva upāyakauśalyasaṃgṛhītā bodhisattvasya prajñā sarvabuddhakāryāṇi karoti /" iti /
T04bsa047_u:1151: bodhisattvānāṃ mārgadṛṣṭerapyanyā tīrthikānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca mārgadṛṣṭirapyanyā /
T04bsa047_u:1152: evaṃ tīrthikamārgadṛṣṭistu ātmādau viparyāsayuktatvāt sarveṇa sarvaḥ prajñārahito mārgaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1160: prajñābalena tu saṃsāre na patati, upāyabalena ca nirvāṇe na patati /
T04bsa047_u:1166: "āryavimalakīrtinirdeśasūtre 'pi- "bodhisattvānāṃ kiṃ bandhanam? kā ca muktiḥ? anupāyena bhavagatiparigraho hi bodhisattvasya bandhanam /
T04bsa047_u:1175: bodhisattvasya prajñāmātrasevanaṃ tu śrāvakeṣṭanirvāṇapatitatvād bandhanavad bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa047_u:1178: tasmād vāyupīḍitena agnisevanavad bodhisattvena viparyāsavāyumātraprahāṇatvāt sopyāprajñayā śūnyatā sevitavyā, na tu śrāvakavat sākṣātkaraṇīyā /
T04bsa047_u:1179: yathā āryadaśadharmasūtre coktam- "kulaputra! tadyathā yathā kaścinmanuṣyaḥ
T04bsa047_u:1180: agniparicaryāṃ karoti, sa tadagnisatkāraṃ karoti, guruṃ karoti, kintu so 'yamiti mayā so 'gniḥ satkṛtya, gurūkṛtya mānitaśca iti kṛte 'pi eṣa dvābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ parigṛhītavya iti na cintayati /
T04bsa047_u:1181: tat kasmāditi cet tannidhānne mayi kāyikaduḥkhaṃ cittadaurmanasyaṃ vā sambhāvyate iti cintanāt
T04bsa047_u:1184: tat kasya hetoriti cet? tannidhānād ahaṃ bodhiṃ nirvarteyam iti cintanād" iti /
T04bsa047_u:1185: kevalam upāyamātrasevane 'pi bodhisattvaḥ pṛthagjanabhūmeranuttīrṇatvād atyavabaddha eva bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa047_u:1187: evaṃ mantraparigṛhītaviṣavad bodhisattvakleśe 'pi prajñāparigrahabalena bhāvite sati amṛtikatā
T04bsa047_u:1188: punaḥ svabhāvena abhyudayaphalaṃ dānādi yadasti tatra kimuta (Bhk 218) vaktavyam /
T04bsa047_u:1190: kāśyapa! mantrauṣadhaparigṛhītaṃ viṣaṃ na vinipātayati evameva bodhisattvānām kleśaḥ prajñāparigṛhitatvād api na śaknoti vinipātayitum iti /
T04bsa047_u:1191: tasmād yena kāraṇena bodhisattva upāyabalena saṃsāramanutsṛjati tasmād nirvāṇe na patati /
T04bsa047_u:1192: yasmāt prajñābalena sakalālambanaṃ prahīyate tasmāt saṃsāre na patati, tasmād apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇabuddhatvaṃ prāpyate /
T04bsa047_u:1193: tasmād āryagaganagañje 'pi uktam- "tatprajñānena hi sarvakleśāḥ parivarjyante /
T04bsa047_u:1194: upāyajñānena hi sarvasattvā na parityajyante /" iti /
T04bsa047_u:1196: 'pi- "ekāntasattvārthavimukhasya ekāntasaṃskārābhisaṃskāravimukhasya nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiruktā mayeti /" tasmād buddhatvaprātukāmena prajñopāyau ubhau sevitavyau /
T04bsa047_u:1197: tatra lokottaraprajñābhāvanāvasare, atisamāhitāvasare vā dānādyupāyasevanāsambhāvanāyāmapi tatra prayogatatpṛṣṭhalabdhaprajñayoḥ yo
T04bsa047_u:1200: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvānām ayaṃ hi prajñopāyayuganaddhavāhi mārgaḥ sarvasattvāvalokitamahākaruṇayā parigṛhītatvāt lokottaramārgaḥ
T04bsa047_u:1201: sevyate, utthānopāyakāle 'pi māyākāravad aviparyastameva dānādi sevyate /
T04bsa047_u:1202: āryākṣayamatinirdeśe 'pi yathoktam- "tatra ko hi bodhisattvopāyaḥ? kaśca prajñābhinirhāra iti? yataḥ samādhāne sattvāvalokitamahākaruṇāvalambane
T04bsa047_u:1210: upāyajñānena yaḥ sarvasattvaparipāko 'pi prayojyaḥ" iti vistaraḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1213: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
T04bsa047_u:1216: bodhisattvanām prajñopāyavidhireva sādhyamadhikṛtya tatprayogasaṃsāre sthito 'pi asti, āśayanirvāṇe sthito 'pi syād ityuktam /
T04bsa047_u:1217: tādṛśyāṃ śūnyatāmahākaruṇāgarbhānuttarasamyaksaṃbuddhau pariṇatadānādyupāyabhāvanāṃ kṛtvā, paramārthabodhicittotpādārtha pūrvavat nityaṃ kāle kāle śamathavipaśyanāprayogo yathāśakti bhāvanīyaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1218: āryagocarapariśuddhisūtre- sarvāvasthāsu sattvārthakāribodhisattvānāmanuśaṃsā yathā nirdiṣṭā tathā saṃnihitasmṛtyā
T04bsa047_u:1220: tādṛkkaruṇopāyabodhicittabhāvakaḥ sa iha janmani avaśyaṃ viśiṣṭo bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:1233: atha ṛddhibalena anantalokadhātūn gatvā bhagavato buddhān pūjayati /
T04bsa047_u:1243: tena tādṛkkaruṇopāyabodhicittāni ca nityam ādareṇa ciraṃbhavitāni kramaśaḥ cittasaṃtāne atipariśuddhakṣaṇotpādena paripākabhūtatvād araṇimanthanāgnivat samyagarthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantaṃ gamanaṃ bhūtvā lokottarajñānasakalavikalpajālāpagamanaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1253: adhimuktibhūmau tu adhimuktivaśāt pravṛttirvyavasthāpitā na tu abhisaṃskāreṇa /
T04bsa047_u:1255: tathā prathamabhūmipraveśaḥ tadanantaraṃ bhāvanāmārge lokottareṇa tatpṛṣṭhalabdhajñānena dvābhyāṃ ca prajñopāyabhāvanākrameṇa bhāvanāpraheyasaṃcitāvaraṇasya sūkṣmasūkṣmataravyavadānād uttarottaraviśiṣṭaguṇaprāptaye adhobhūmipariśodhanena tathāgatajñānaparyantaṃ praviśya, sarvajñatāsāgaram avatīrya,
T04bsa047_u:1257: evaṃ krameṇa eva cittasaṃtānapariśuddhiḥ āryalaṅkāvatāre 'pi uktā /
T04bsa047_u:1259: (Bhk 221) 'pi yathoktam- "krameṇottarottarabhūmisu suvarṇavat cittaṃ vyavadāya, anuttarasaṃyaksaṃbodhiparyantam abhisaṃbudhyati" iti /
T04bsa047_u:1263: aśeṣaguṇasaṃpattiprakarṣaparyantabhutaḥ, savāsanādoṣaṃ sakalamalaṃ nirākṛtya, sattvadhātvantaparyantavihārī, iti prekṣāvān bhagavati buddhe sakalaguṇākare śraddhām utpādya tadguṇapariniṣpattyarthaṃ svayaṃ sarvān prayatnān kuryāt /
T04bsa047_u:1264: tasmād bhagavatā evamuktam- "tadetat sarvajñajñānaṃ karuṇāmūlaṃ bodhicittahetukam upāyaparyavasānam" iti /
T04bsa047_u:1266: vivecya gṛṇhanti subhāṣitāni haṃsāḥ payo yatpayāṃsi prahṛṣṭāḥ //
T04bsa047_u:1269: prakāśya yat prāpi mayā śubham asamapaddhitam /
T04bsa047_u:1272: bharatīyopādhyāyena prajñāvarmaṇā mahālokacakṣuṣā vandyajñānasenena cānūdya sunirṇitaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1278: samadhirupadiṣṭaḥ, tathāpi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ sarve samādhayo vyāptā iti /
T04bsa047_u:1282: vipaśyanāṃ bhāvayitvā śamathaṃ ca vimucyate // iti /
T04bsa047_u:1284: śamathabalena svālambane cittam aprakampyaṃ bhavati nivātasthitapradīpavat
T04bsa047_u:1286: tataḥ sakalam āvaraṇaṃ prahīyate, andhakāravad ālokodayāt /
T04bsa047_u:1287: ata eva bhagavatā catvāryālambanavastūni yogināṃ nirdiṣṭāni /
T04bsa047_u:1290: tatra śamathena yat sarvadharmapratibimbakaṃ buddhādirūpaṃ cādhimucyālambyate tena nirvikalpapratibimbakam ucyate /
T04bsa047_u:1292: yathāśrutodgṛhītānāñca dharmāṇāṃ pratibimbakam adhimucyālambyata iti kṛtvā pratibimbakam ucyate
T04bsa047_u:1293: tad eva pratibimbakaṃ yadā vipaśyanayā vicārayati yogī tattvādhigamārthaṃ tadā savikalpapratibimbakam
T04bsa047_u:1295: tasyaiva ca pratibimbasya svabhāvaṃ nirūpayan (Bhk 224) yogī
T04bsa047_u:1298: yadā vastu paryantatālakṣaṇāṃ tathatāṃ pratibidhyati, tadā vastuparyantatāvagamāt prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vastuparyantatālambanam ucyate /
T04bsa047_u:1299: tato bhāvanāmārgeṇa pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣvoṣadhirasāyanopayogād iva krameṇa viśuddhataratamakṣaṇodayād āśrayaparāvṛttau satyām,
T04bsa047_u:1300: āvaraṇa-prahāṇalakṣaṇa-kāryaparisamāptiryadā bhavati tadā buddhabhūmau tad eva jñānaṃ kāryapariniṣpattyālambanam ucyate /
T04bsa047_u:1301: tad evam anena kiṃ darśitaṃ bhavati? śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ samastavastuparyantatādhigamo bhavati
T04bsa047_u:1305: yastu te na sevate tasya naiva vastuparyantatādhigamo nāpi kāryapariniṣpattiriti /
T04bsa047_u:1307: vipaśyanā bhūtapratyavekṣeti saṃkṣepād āryaratnameghādau bhagavatā śamathavipaśyanayorlakṣaṇam uktam /
T04bsa047_u:1308: tatra yoginā śīlaviśuddhayādau śamathavipaśyanāsaṃbhāre sthitena sarvasattveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādya, samutpādita-bodhicittena śrutacintābhāvanāyāṃ prayoktavyam /
T04bsa047_u:1309: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yogī bhāvanā-kāle sarvam itikaraṇiyaṃ parisamāpya
T04bsa047_u:1310: kṛtamūtrapurīṣaḥ kaṇṭaka-svarādirahite mano 'nukūle pradeśe sthitvā mayā
T04bsa047_u:1312: sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇāśayo mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtya, daśadigavasthitān sarvabuddhabodhisattvān pañcāṅgena praṇipatyāgrato buddhabodhisattvān pīṭhādau sthāpayitvā anyatra vā yathāvat tebhyaśca yathāruci pūjāstavanaṃ kṛtvā svapāpaṃ pradeśya, sakalasdya jagataḥ puṇyam anumodya,
T04bsa047_u:1314: ardhaparyeṅkeṇa vā niṣadya nātyunmīlite nātinimīlite nāsikāgravinyaste cakṣuṣī kṛtvā, nātinamraṃ nātistabdham ṛjukāyaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1317: / śiro nonnataṃ nāvanatam ekapārśve niścalaṃ sthāpayitavyam /
T04bsa047_u:1321: āśvāsapraśvāsāstu na saśabdā nāpi śthūlā nāpi tvaritāḥ karaṇīyāḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1322: kiṃ tvasaṃlakṣayamāṇāṃ mandaṃ mandamanābhogena yathā praviśeyurnirgaccheyurvā tathā karaṇiyam
T04bsa047_u:1323: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yogī yathādṛṣṭaśrute tathāgatavigrahe cittaṃ sthāpayitvā śamathaṃ niṣpādayet
T04bsa047_u:1324: tañca tathāgatavigraham uttaptakanakāvadātaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanālaṃkṛtaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyagataṃ nānāvidhairupāyaiḥ sattvārthaṃ kurvantaṃ prābandhikena manasikāreṇa tadguṇābhilāṣaṃ samupādāya layauddhatyādīn vyupaśamayya tāvad dhyāyed yāvat sphuṭataraṃ puro 'vasthitamiva taṃ paśyet tataḥ tasya tathāgatavigrahapratibimbakasyāgatigatiṃ nirūpayato vipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati /
T04bsa047_u:1326: yathedaṃ tathāgatavigrahapratibimbakaṃ na kutaścid āgataṃ nāpi kvacid gamiṣyati tiṣṭhadapi svabhāvaśūnyam ātmātmīyarahitaṃ tathā eva sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyā āgatigatirahitāḥ
T04bsa047_u:1328: nirjalpaikarase manasā tattvaṃ bhāvayan yāvadicchaṃ tiṣṭhet /
T04bsa047_u:1331: etāvatā prakāreṇa sarvadharmasaṃgraho bhavati, tatra cittam upanibadhya
T04bsa047_u:1337: tatra bālā bhāvādigrahābhiniveśād viparyastadhiyaḥ saṃsāre paribhramanti /
T04bsa047_u:1338: teṣāṃ viparyāsāpanayanāya, teṣu ca mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtya, niṣpannaśamatho yogī tattvādhigamāya tato vipaśyanāṃ bhāvayet /
T04bsa047_u:1352: tasmād alīkavibhrama evāyaṃ lokasya yadutāhaṃ mameti niścayaṃ pratipannasya /
T04bsa047_u:1354: dharmān dharmanairātmyādhigamāya vicārayet- kim ete cittavyatirekeṇa
T04bsa047_u:1355: paramārthasantaḥ sthitāḥ āhosviccittameva rūpādinirbhāsaṃ svapnāvasthāyāṃ pratibhāsavat pratibhāsata iti /
T04bsa047_u:1356: sa tān paramāṇuśo nirūpayan, paramāṇūṃśca bhāgaśaḥ pratyavekṣamāṇo nopalabhate /
T04bsa047_u:1360: aṇuśo vibhajati dravyaṃ na caiva rūpaṃ vikalpayet /
T04bsa047_u:1363: tasyaivaṃ bhavati cittamevānādikālikavitatharūpādyabhiniveśavaśāt svapnopalabhyamānarūpādipratibhāsavad bālānāṃ bahiḥ vicchinnamiva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ khyāti /
T04bsa047_u:1365: sa evaṃ cittameva sakaladharmaprajñaptiṃ niścitya tatra pratyavekṣya ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratyavekṣito bhavatīti cittasvabhāvamapi pratyavekṣate /
T04bsa047_u:1366: sa evaṃ vicārayati, cittamapi paramārthato māyāvad
T04bsa047_u:1368: yada hi alīkasvabhāvarūpādyākāropagraheṇa cittameva citrākāraṃ pratibhāsate, tadāsyāpi rūpādivat tadavyatirekāt satyatvaṃ kutra bhavet? yathā citrākāratayā rūpādayo naikānekasvabhāvāstathā cittamapi tadavyatirekeṇa naikānekasvabhāvam /
T04bsa047_u:1374: yenāpi cittena pratyavekṣate yogī tasyāpi svabhāvaṃ parīkṣamāṇo nopalabhate /
T04bsa047_u:1375: tad evaṃ yatra yatrālambane yoginaścittaṃ prasaret tasya tasya svabhāvaṃ parīkṣamāṇo [tat svabhāvamapi nopalabhate] 'sau yada nopalabhate tadā sarvameva vastu vicārya kadalīskandhavad asāramavagamya,
T04bsa047_u:1377: tato bhāvādivikalpoparatau sarvaprapañcavigatam ānimittaṃ yogaṃ pratilabhate /
T04bsa047_u:1378: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe- "sa evam apakṣālakuśalaḥ sarvaprapañcavigamāya śūnyatābhāvanāyā yogamāpadyate /
T04bsa047_u:1379: sa śūnyatābhāvanābahulo yeṣu yeṣu sthāneṣu cittaṃ prasarati cittamabhiramate tāni tāni sthānāni svabhāvataḥ (Bhk 228) parigaveṣamāṇaḥ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati [yat cittaṃ tadapi parīkṣamāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati] yenāpi cittena parīkṣate tad api svabhāvataḥ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati /
T04bsa047_u:1382: yastu nopaparīkṣate tasya nāsti nirnimittatāyāṃ praveśa iti /
T04bsa047_u:1383: sa evaṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvamupaparīkṣamāṇo yada nopalabhate, tadāstīti na vikalpayati nāstīti na vikalpayati /
T04bsa047_u:1386: yadi hi bhāvaḥ kadācid dṛṣṭo bhavet,
T04bsa047_u:1388: yadā kālatraye 'pi yoginā prajñayā nirūpayatā bhāvo nopalabdhaḥ tadā kasya pratiṣedhān nāstīti
T04bsa047_u:1390: evamanye vikalpāstasya tadānīṃ na santi eva,
T04bsa047_u:1395: prajñayā ca nirūpayataḥ sakalavastusvabhāvānupalambhāt prajñottaradhyāyī bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:1396: sa evaṃ pudgaladharmanairātmyamayaṃ tattvamavatīrṇaḥ, aparasya parīkṣaṇīyasya cābhāvād, uparatavicāreṇa nirvikalpaikarasena manasā svarasavāhinā,
T04bsa047_u:1397: anabhisaṃskārataḥ tad eva tattvaṃ sphuṭataram avadhārayan yogī tiṣṭheta /
T04bsa047_u:1399: yadāntarā cittaṃ bahirdhā vikṣiptaṃ paśyet tadā tatsvabhāvapratyevekṣaṇena vikṣepaṃ praśamayya, punastatraiva cittamuparyupari prerayet /
T04bsa047_u:1400: yadā tu tatrānabhirataṃ cittaṃ paśyet, tadā samādherguṇadarśanād abhiratiṃ tatra thāvayet
T04bsa047_u:1402: atha styānamiddhābhibhavād yada pracāratayā līnaṃ cittaṃ paśyet,
T04bsa047_u:1403: layābhiśaṅkitaṃ vā tadā pramodyavastu buddharūpādikamālokasaṃjñāṃ vā manasikṛtya layamupaśamayet, tatastad eva tattvaṃ dṛḍhataraṃ (Bhk 229)
T04bsa047_u:1405: yadā tu jātyandhavad andhakārapraviṣṭapuruṣavad vinimīlitākṣavat sphuṭataraṃ tattvaṃ nāvadhārayed yogī, tadā tasya līnaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1407: atha yathā pūrvānubhūtaviṣayaspṛhayā cittamantarā samuddhataṃ paśyed,
T04bsa047_u:1410: tataḥ punaḥ tatraiva tattve cittānabhisaṃskāravāhitāyāṃ yatnaṃ kurvīta /
T04bsa047_u:1411: yadā ca vikṣiptapuruṣavad vānaravad vānavasthitavṛtti cittaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1412: bhavet, tad auddhatyaṃ boddhavyaṃ śamatharahitaṃ ca /
T04bsa047_u:1413: atha yadā layauddhatyābhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhi sphuṭataraṃ tatraiva tattve cittam utpādyate tadābhogaśithilīkaraṇād upekṣaṇiyam /
T04bsa047_u:1415: yadā ca vipaśyanā bhāvayet prajñātiriktatarā bhāvayet, tadā śamathasyālpatvāt pravātasthitapradipavat pracalatvāccittasya na sphuṭataraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:1417: śamathasyābhyādhikye middhāvaṣṭabadhapuruṣasyeva sphuṭataraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ na syāt /
T04bsa047_u:1419: yadā samapravṛtte dve api bhavato yuganaddhavāhibalīvardadvayavat tadānabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tāvat sthātavyaṃ yāvat kāyacittapīḍā na bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:1420: saṃkṣepataḥ sarvasyaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti /
T04bsa047_u:1425: prasrabdhiḥ, smṛtiḥ, saṃprajanyam, cetanā, upekṣā ceti /
T04bsa047_u:1427: tathā hi- samādhiguṇeṣvabhisaṃpratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā yogino 'bhilāṣaḥ samutpadyate /
T04bsa047_u:1436: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tu anābhogadoṣaḥ tatastatpratipakṣeṇa cetanā bhāvanīyā /
T04bsa047_u:1437: layauddhatyapraśame sati, yadā praśamabāhi cittaṃ bhavet,
T04bsa047_u:1440: yadi samapravṛtte citte ābhogaḥ kriyate, tadā cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
T04bsa047_u:1442: citte sati yadyābhogo na kriyate, tadā vipaśyanārahitatvād,
T04bsa047_u:1446: tato yāvadiccha yogī tāvad anabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tattvaṃ bhāvayaṃstiṣṭhet /
T04bsa047_u:1447: satyāṃ tu kāyādipīḍāyāṃ punaḥ punarantarā sakalameva lokaṃ vyavalokyamāyājala candropamapratibhāsaṃ [vata] avataret /
T04bsa047_u:1448: tatha coktam avikalpapraveśe- lokottareṇa jñānenākāśasamatalān sarvadharmānpaśyati /
T04bsa047_u:1450: tad evaṃ māyopamaṃ jagad avagamya, sattveṣu mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtyaivam
T04bsa047_u:1453: bālabuddhaya ādiśānteṣveva dharmeṣu bhāvādisamāropaviparyastā vividhakarmakleśān upacinvanti
T04bsa047_u:1455: kariṣyāmi yathaitān evaṃvidhaṃ dharmāgāmbhīryam avabodhayeyam iti, tato viśramya punarapi tathaiva sarvadharmanirābhāsaṃ samādhimavataret /
T04bsa047_u:1457: evam anena krameṇa ghaṭikām [arthapraharam] ekapraharaṃ vā yāvantaṃ kālaṃ śaknoti tāvantaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1460: tata icchayā samādheḥ utthātuṃ paryaṅkam abhittvaivam anuvicintayet /
T04bsa047_u:1461: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ sarva eva paramārthato 'nutpannāstathāpi māyavat pratiniyatavividhahetupratyayasāmagrīvaśena vicitrā evāvicāraramaṇīyāḥ
T04bsa047_u:1463: nāpyapavādāntasya, yataśca prajñayā vicāryamāṇā nopalabhyante, tena na śāśvatadṛṣṭiprasaṅgo nāpi samāropāntasya /
T04bsa047_u:1464: tatra ye prajñācakṣurvikalatayā viparyastamatayā ātmābhiniviṣṭā vividhāni karmāṇi kurvanti te saṃsāre paribhramanti /
T04bsa047_u:1465: ye punarekāntena saṃsāravimukhā mahākāruṇyavikalatayā ca na [sattvārthaṃ]
T04bsa047_u:1466: dānādipāramitāḥ paripūrayanti ātmānaṃ damayanti te sattvā upāyavikalatayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhau patanti /
T04bsa047_u:1467: ye tu asvabhāvaṃ jagad avagamya mahākāruṇyabalena sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇakṛtaniścayā māyākāravad aviparyastadhiyo vipulapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraṃ samupāyanti te tathāgataṃ padaṃ prāpyāsaṃsāramaśeṣasya jagataḥ sarvākāraṃ hitasukhāni saṃpādayantaḥ tiṣṭhanti /
T04bsa047_u:1468: te ca jñāna[sambhāra]balena [samasta]kleśaprahāṇān na saṃsāre patanti sarvasattvāpekṣayā ca samupārjitavipulāprameyapuṇyasaṃbhāravaśena na nirvāṇe patanti, sarvasattvopajīvyāśca bhavanti tasmān mayā sakalasattvahitasukhādhānārthināpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇam adhigantukāmena vipulapuṇyajñāna-saṃbhāropārjane 'bhiyogaḥ [sadā] karaṇiyaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1471: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyasambhāre jñānasaṃbhāre ca sarvadābhiyogaḥ
T04bsa047_u:1473: āryatathāgatotpattisaṃbhasūtre coktam- "sa khalu punareṣa tathāgatānāṃ (Bhk 232) saṃbhavo naikena kāraṇena bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:1474: tat kasya hetoḥ? samudāgataistāvad bho jinaputrāprameyaśatasahasradaśakāraṇaistathāgatāḥ samudāgacchanti /
T04bsa047_u:1479: tad evaṃ kṛtvā śanaiḥ paryaṅkaṃ bhittvā daśadigvyavasthitān sarvabuddhabodhisattvān praṇipatya tebhyaśca pūjāstotropahāraṃ kṛtvāryabhadracaryādipraṇidhānaṃ pranidadhīta /
T04bsa047_u:1481: yastu manyate, cittavikalpasamutthāpitaśubhāśubhakarmavaśena sattvāḥ svargādikarma phalamanubhavantaḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti /

T04bsa047_u:1490: bhūtapratyavekṣā-mūlatvāt samyagjñānasya tatpratikṣepā llokottarāpi prajñā pratikṣiptā bhavet
T04bsa047_u:1492: nāpi dānādicaryā kartavyeti vadatā copāyo dānādiḥ sphuṭatarameva pratikṣiptaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1493: etāvad eva ca saṃkṣiptaṃ mahāyānaṃ yaduta prajñopāyaśca /
T04bsa047_u:1498: ca prajñopāyau bodhisattvānāṃ sarvapāramitāsaṃgrahāya saṃvartete" iti /
T04bsa047_u:1499: tataśca mahāyānaṃ pratikṣipatā mahat karmāvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
T04bsa047_u:1502: asyānupāsitavidvajjanasyānavadhārita-tathāgata-pravacananīteḥ svayaṃ vinaṣṭasya parān api nāśayato yuktyāgamadūṣitatvāt, viṣasaṃsṛṣṭavacanaṃ saviṣabhojanamiva ātmakāmena dhīmatā dūrata eva parihartavyam /
T04bsa047_u:1503: tathā hyanena bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ pratikṣipatā dharmapravicayākhyaṃ pradhānam eva bodhyaṅgaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ syāt /
T04bsa047_u:1504: vinā ca mūtapratyavekṣayā yoginaḥ katham anādikālābhyastarūpādibhāvābhiniveśasya cittaṃ nirvikalpatāṃ praviśet? sarvadharmeṣvasmṛtyamanasikāreṇa praviśatīti cet,
T04bsa047_u:1506: na hi vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayānubhūyamāneṣvapi sarvadharmeṣvasmṛtiramanasikāro vā śakyate kartum
T04bsa047_u:1507: yadi ca nāmāmī dharmā mayāsmartavyā nāpi manasikartavyā ityevaṃ bhāvayannasmṛtimanasikārau teṣu bhāvayet tadā sutarām eva tena te smṛtā manasikṛtāśca syuḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1508: atha smṛtimanasikārābhāvamātram asmṛtyamanasikārāvabhipretau, tadā tayorabhāvaḥ kena prakāreṇa bhavatīti etad eva vicāryate /
T04bsa047_u:1516: dharmāṇāṃ katham avagatā bhavet? na hi svabhāvata evaṃ dharmāḥ (Bhk 234)
T04bsa047_u:1517: śūnyāḥ sthitā ityevaṃ vinā tatpratyavekṣayā tacchūnyatāprativedho bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:1518: nāpi vinā śūnyatāprativedhena āvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ saṃbhavati sarvatra sarveṣāṃ muktiprasaṅgāt
T04bsa047_u:1519: kiṃ ca tasya yogino yadi sarvadharmeṣu muṣitasmṛtitayā mūḍhatayā vā smṛtimanasikārau na pravartete, tadātyantamūḍhaḥ katham asau yogī bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:1520: vinā ca bhūtapratyavekṣayā tatrāsmṛtim amanasikāraṃ cābhyastatā moha evābhyasto bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:1522: athāsau na muṣitasmṛtirnāpi mūḍhaḥ, tadā kathaṃ tatrāsmaraṇam amanasikāraṃ kartu śaknuyād vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayā /
T04bsa047_u:1523: na hi smaranneva na smarati, paśyan eva na paśyatīti yuktam abhidhātum /
T04bsa047_u:1524: asmṛtyamanasikārābhyāsācca kathaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyādi-buddhadharmodayo bhavet, virodhāt, na hyuṣṇaviruddhaṃ śītam āsevamānasya uṣṇasparśasaṃvedanaṃ bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:1525: kiṃ ca samādhisamāpannasya yogino yadi manovijñānam asti, tadāvaśyaṃ tena kiṃcid ālambayitavyam
T04bsa047_u:1526: na hi pṛthagjanānāṃ sahasā nirālambanaṃ jñānaṃ bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:1527: atha nāsti, tadā kathaṃ niḥsvabhāvatā dharmāṇāmavagatā bhavet?
T04bsa047_u:1528: kena ca pratipakṣeṇa kleśāvaraṇaṃ prahīyate? na ca caturthadhyānālābhinaḥ
T04bsa047_u:1530: tasmāt saddharme yāvasmṛtyamanasikārau paṭhitau tau bhūtapratyavekṣāpūrvākau draṣṭavyau /
T04bsa047_u:1532: tathā hi yadā nirūpayan samyakprajñayā yogī kālatraye paramārthataḥ samutpannaṃ na kaṃcid dharma paśyati, tadā tatra kathaṃ smṛtimanasikārau kuryāt /
T04bsa047_u:1533: yo hi kālatraye 'pyasattvān nānubhūtaḥ paramārthataḥ sa kathaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1535: tato 'sau sarvaprapañcopaśamaṃ nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ praviṣṭo bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:1536: tatpraveśācca śūnyatāṃ pratividhyati tatprativedhācca prahīṇasakalakudṛṣṭijālo bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:1540: tasmānna vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayā samyagjñānodayo nāpi kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇām
T04bsa047_u:1541: / tathā coktaṃ mañjuśrīvikurvitasūtre- "kathaṃ dārike bodhisattvo vijitasaṃgrāmo bhavati? āha, yo mañjuśrīḥ vicāya vicāya sarvadharmān nopalabhate" iti /
T04bsa047_u:1543: nirjitya, nirbhayo viharan yogī, na tu kātarapuruṣa iva vinimīlitākṣaḥ /

T04bsa047_u:1549: /" āryalaṅkāvatāre coktam- "yasmāt, mahāmate, buddhayā vicāryamāṇānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvānāṃ nāvadhāryate /
T04bsa047_u:1551: tatra tatra sūtre yā bhagavatā nānāprakārā pratyavekṣā nirdiṣṭā sā virudhyate, yadi bhūtapratyavekṣā na kartavyā /
T04bsa047_u:1552: tasmād evaṃ yuktaṃ vaktuṃ vayam alpaprajñā alpavīryāścana śaknumo bāhuśrutyaṃ paryeṣitumiti

T04bsa047_u:1558: pravartayatām ayoniśaḥ tad bhavatīti tatpratiṣedhāya yad uktaṃ na bhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ sa pratiṣedhaḥ tasyāḥ sarvasūtreṣvanujñānāt /

T04bsa047_u:1570: kiñca yad eva śrutacintāmayyā prajñayā viditaṃ tad eva bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā bhāvanīyaṃ nānyat

T04bsa047_u:1577: tatraivaivaṃ vadatā karmakṣayān muktirityājīvaka vādābhyupagamo bhavet /

T04bsa047_u:1616: dāna-śīla-kṣānti-vīrya-dhyāna-prajñāsamatām ajānatopalambhayati, tena paryeṣṭitadānena parāmṛṣṭaśīlena śīlaṃ rakṣitam /

T04bsa047_u:1624: animittavihāre cānabhisaṃskāravāhinaḥ sthitasya bodhisattvasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati, nānyasyetyetāvanmātraṃ pratipāditam /
T04bsa047_u:1625: sarveṣāṃ ca dānādīnāṃ paramārthato 'nutpannatvaṃ ca paridīpitam, na tu caryā na kartavyetyabhihitam
T04bsa047_u:1626: anyathā hi dīpaṅkarāvadāne ye buddhā bhagavatā paryupāsitā yeṣāṃ tu kalpamapi bhagavatā bhāṣamāṇena na śakyaṃ nāmaparikīrtnaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ caryāpratiṣedho na kṛtaḥ dīpaṅkareṇāpi tadānīṃ bhagavataścaryāpratiṣedho na kṛta eva /
T04bsa047_u:1627: kiṃ tu yadā śāntānimittavihāre 'ṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau sthito 'sau dṛṣṭastadāsau vyākṛto bhagavatā, tatra tasya caryā (Bhk 240) apratiṣiddhā /
T04bsa047_u:1628: sā cānimittavihāraparamatā bodhisattvānām aṣṭāmyāṃ bhūmau daśabhūmikairbuddhaiḥ pratiṣiddhā 'mā bhūd etad eva teṣāṃ parinirvāṇam'
T04bsa047_u:1629: iti kṛtvā yadi tu sarvathā caryā na kartavyā bhavet pūrvoktaṃ sarva virudhyeta /
T04bsa047_u:1630: yacca tatraiva brahmaparipṛcchāyām uktam- "dānaṃ ca dadāti taccāvipākābhikāṅkṣī, śīlaṃ ca rakṣati taccāsamāropitaḥ" ityādi /
T04bsa047_u:1631: caturbhiḥ brahma! dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā avaivarttikā bhavanti buddhadharmeṣu
T04bsa047_u:1633: nāpi mṛdvindriyeṇaiva caryā kartavyā na tu tīkṣṇendriyeṇeti yuktaṃ vaktum /
T04bsa047_u:1634: yataḥ prathamāṃ bhūmimupādāya yāvaddaśamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānādicaryā utpadyate, na ca pariśiṣṭāsu na samudācaratīti vacanāt /
T04bsa047_u:1641: nāpi ṣaṭpāramitādaśabhūmivyatirekeṇānyo bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo 'sti yaḥ śīghrataravāhīsyāt /
T04bsa047_u:1642: krameṇaiva ca cittasaṃtateḥ kanakaśuddhivat śuddhirbhavatīti sūtre varṇitam [āryalaṅkāvatāradaśabhūmikādau
T04bsa047_u:1643: tathatāyāṃ yadā sthito bodhisattvo bhavati, tadā prathamāyāṃ bhūmau
T04bsa047_u:1645: tataḥ krameṇaiva pūrvabhūmīḥ pariśodhya tathāgatabhūmiṃ praviśatīti /
T04bsa047_u:1647: buddhatvapurapraveśe anyanmukhaṃ nāpi bhagavatā kvacit sūtrādau deśitam /
T04bsa047_u:1649: dhyāna eva ṣaṭpāramitāntargamāt tatsevanād eva sarvapāramitāḥ sevitā bhavantyato na dānādayaḥ [anyapāramitāḥ] pṛthak sevitavyā iti cet tad ayuktam /
T04bsa047_u:1650: evaṃ hi buddhe gomayamaṇḍale 'pi ṣaṭpāramitāntargamān maṇḍalakam eva kartavyaṃ syānna dhyānādyāḥ
T04bsa047_u:1651: śrāvakasyāpi nirodhasamādhisamāpannasya nimittād eva asamudācārāt tadā ṣaṭpāramitāparipūriprasaṅgaḥ
T04bsa047_u:1652: tataśca na śrāvakebhyo bodhisattvānāṃ bhedaḥ pratipādito bhavet /
T04bsa047_u:1653: sarvāvasthāyām eva tu bodhisattvena ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayitavyā iti saṃdarśanārthe ekaikapāramitāntarbhāvaḥ sarvapāramitānāṃ bhagavatā sandarśitaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1656: 'pyayaṃ maitreya! ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bodhisattvānāṃ saṃbodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti, prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ bodhisattvena
T04bsa047_u:1659: tat kiṃ manyase, ajita! duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājo 'bhūt, yena kapotārthena śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni? maitreya āha- no hīdaṃ bhagavan!
T04bsa047_u:1660: bhagavān āha- yāni mayā maitreya! bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlānyupacitāni
T04bsa047_u:1662: kuśalamūlaiḥ? maitreya āha, no hīdaṃ bhagavan, bhagavān āha- tvaṃ tāvad ajita! ṣaṣṭikalpān dānāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1665: ekanayenaiva bodhiryaduta śūnyatānayeneti te caryāpariśuddhā bhavanti"
T04bsa047_u:1667: kevalaṃ śūnyātām eva sevamānāḥ śrāvakavannirvāṇe patanti /
T04bsa047_u:1672: yuktayāgamopetaṃ tyaktvā bhagavadvacanaṃ ca parityajya anyasya mūrkhajanasya vacanaṃ prekṣāvatā grahītum ayuktam /
T04bsa047_u:1673: āryaratnakūṭe ca- "sakaladānādikuśalopetatayā sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatā sevanīyetyuktaṃ na tu kevalā /" āryaratnakūṭe coktam- tadyathā kāśyapāmātyasaṃgṛhītā rājānaḥ sarvakāryāṇi kurvanti evam eva upāyakauśalyasaṃgṛhītā bodhisattvasya prajñā sarvabuddhakāryāṇi karoti /
T04bsa047_u:1674: ata eva kevalāṃ śūnyatāṃ sevamānasya mā bhūnnirvāṇapraveśa iti /
T04bsa047_u:1676: āryatathāgataguhyasūtre" coktam- "naikāntanirālambanaṃ cittamātrasevanaṃ kartavyam api tu upāyakauśalyam api sevanīyam iti pradarśanārtham uktam-
T04bsa047_u:1684: śūnyatārambaṇaṃ ca pratyavekṣate sarvasattvamahākaruṇārambaṇaṃ ca prekṣate iti hi kulaputra! upāyakuśalaḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddho bodhisattvo 'nārambane vaśitāṃ pratilabhate" iti vistaram uktvā punaśca vadatyevaṃ hi- "nāsti tat kiṃcid ārambaṇaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1686: yasya bodhisattvasya sarvārambāṇāni bodhipariṇāmitāni, ayaṃ bodhisattva upāyakuśala sarvadharmān bodhyanugatān paśyati /
T04bsa047_u:1687: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra, nāsti tat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yat sattvānām
T04bsa047_u:1689: (Bhk 243) evam eva, kulaputra nāsti tat kiṃcid ārambaṇaṃ yad upāyakuśalo bodhisattvo bodhāya copakārībhūtaṃ na paśyati"
T04bsa047_u:1692: tatra yadi nāma svayaṃ na śakyate dānādidpuṇyasaṃbhāravīryam ārabdhuṃ tathāpi anyeṣām evam upadeśo dātuṃ na yuktaśceti svaparadrohaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt /
T04bsa047_u:1693: tad evaṃ yuktyāgamābhyāṃ pratipāditaṃ yathā bodhisattvenāvaśyaṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā kartavyā sakaladānādipuṇyasambhāraścopārjayitavyaḥ /
T04bsa047_u:1694: tataḥ prekṣāvatālpaśrutānām ābhimānikānāṃ vacanaṃ viṣam ivāvadhūyāryanāgārjunādividvajjanavacanāmṛtanugatena sakalasattveṣu mahakāruṇām upajanayya māyākāravad
T04bsa047_u:1699: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
T04bsa047_u:1701: sannahyanti jagaddhetoḥ jñātapūrve jage tathā // iti tasyaivaṃ /
T04bsa047_u:1702: prajñām upāyaṃ ca satataṃ satkṛtyābhyasyataḥ krameṇa [cittaṃ]
T04bsa047_u:1703: saṃtatiparipākād uttarottaraviśuddhataratamakṣaṇodayād bhūtārthabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamena sakalakalpanājālarahitaṃ sphuṭataraṃ dharmadhātvadhigamaṃ vimalaṃ
T04bsa047_u:1708: tatastaduttarā bhūmīḥ pariśodhayan krameṇa kanakavad aśeṣāvaraṇāpagame sati asaktam apratihataṃ jñānaṃ pratilabhya buddhabhūmim aśeṣaguṇādhārāṃ prāpto bhavati /
T04bsa047_u:1710: tasmād buddhatvādhigamārthinā madhyamapaddhatau tāvad abhiyogaḥ karaṇīya iti /
T04bsa047_u:1712: prakāśya yat prāpi mayā śubham asamapaddhitam /
T04bsa047_u:1715: vivecya gṛṇhanti subhāṣitāni haṃsāḥ payo yatpayasi prahṛṣṭāḥ //
